statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT id, user_id, interaction_type FROM social_media_interactions WHERE post_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM social_media_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, post_id, interaction_type, created_at FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE post_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4) AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT id, user_id, post_id FROM social_media_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%comment%' AND created_at > '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-05-01'
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS average_user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT post_id) AS total_posts FROM social_media_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_posts DESC
SELECT DISTINCT post_id FROM social_media_interactions WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01'
SELECT * FROM social_media_interaction WHERE id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM social_media_interaction WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT post_id, interaction_type FROM social_media_interaction WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, join_date FROM user_profile ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profile WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username DESC

SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profile INNER JOIN social_media_interaction ON user_profile.user_id = social_media_interaction.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01'
SELECT u.username, COUNT(smi.id) AS interaction_count FROM user_profile u LEFT JOIN social_media_interaction smi ON u.user_id = smi.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY interaction_count DESC
SELECT u.username, COUNT(smi.id) AS total_interactions FROM user_profile u LEFT JOIN social_media_interaction smi ON u.user_id = smi.user_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email HAVING total_interactions > 5
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_likes, post_comments FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_engagement WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT user_id, post_content, created_at FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC, following_count ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT username, post_content, post_likes FROM social_media_users JOIN social_media_posts ON social_media_users.user_id = social_media_posts.user_id WHERE post_likes > 100 ORDER BY post_likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, followers_count, following_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 1000 AND following_count < 500 ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_content, post_likes, post_comments FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_likes BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND post_comments > 10 ORDER BY post_likes DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT username, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_users JOIN social_media_engagement ON social_media_users.user_id = social_media_engagement.user_id WHERE likes_count + comments_count > 100 ORDER BY likes_count DESC, comments_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT username, followers_count, date_joined FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 5000;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100;
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 50 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.post_content, l.like_date FROM social_media_users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN likes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id;
SELECT c.comment_text, u.username FROM comments c JOIN social_media_users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE comment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM social_media_users;
SELECT user_id, followers_count FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_content, comments_count FROM posts WHERE comments_count < 10;
SELECT user_name, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 50 AND comments_count > 10 ORDER BY likes_count DESC, comments_count ASC;

SELECT user_name, post_content, comments.comment_text FROM social_media_users JOIN posts ON social_media_users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE comments.likes_count > 5 ORDER BY user_name ASC;

SELECT user_name, followers_count, hashtags.hashtag_text FROM social_media_users JOIN post_hashtags ON social_media_users.user_id = post_hashtags.post_id JOIN hashtags ON post_hashtags.hashtag_id = hashtags.hashtag_id WHERE followers_count < 500 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT post_content, COUNT(comments.comment_id) AS total_comments FROM posts LEFT JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY posts.post_id HAVING total_comments > 0 ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
